title: Vikingdb-Mcp-Server
description: An MCP server for VikingDB, a high-performance vector database by ByteDance, used for storing and searching information.
creator: KashiwaByte

VIKINGDB_HOST.description: The host to use for the VikingDB server.

VIKINGDB_REGION.description: The region to use for the VikingDB server.

VIKINGDB_AK.description: The Access Key to use for the VikingDB server.

VIKINGDB_SK.description: The Secret Key to use for the VikingDB server.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: The name of the collection to use.

INDEX_NAME.description: The name of the index to use.
